attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: phase out red diesel, farmers already recieve far too many subsidies,this would help the economy and save having staff to do diesel testing on cars ect.also it would serve to decrease the amount of tractors damaging and clogging up our up our highways

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
